body_html: So I'm not exactly sure if we really want to add it. There's no reason to construct a constant-filled Variable from another, using in-place operations. It's nearly equivalent to creating a new Variable, except that you get to hold the history for no good reason (the grad is 0).
body_text: So I'm not exactly sure if we really want to add it. There's no reason to construct a constant-filled Variable from another, using in-place operations. It's nearly equivalent to creating a new Variable, except that you get to hold the history for no good reason (the grad is 0).
body: So I'm not exactly sure if we really want to add it. There's no reason to construct a constant-filled Variable from another, using in-place operations. It's nearly equivalent to creating a new Variable, except that you get to hold the history for no good reason (the grad is 0).
